Authors:
Natalia Ramirez, Nicolas Niveiro, Carlos Alberto
Salvador-Montoya, Fatima Piris da Motta, Maria Laura Perez, Orlando F.
Popoff
Title:
Morphological and phylogenetical assement of Marasmius
jalapensis (Basidiomycota, Agaricales) and closely related species: M.
tricystidiatus sp. nov.
Abstract:
An exhaustive morphological and phylogenetic analysis of
specimens previously determinate as M. jalapensis and some samples of
Marasmius recently collected in Northern Argentina and Paraguay was
carried out. These samples belong to the sect. Sicci subsect. Spinulosi.
Based on our results, a new morphologic delimitation of M. jalapensis is
presented, with a more restricted distribution pattern, and a new
species is described and illustrated for northern Argentina and
Colombia, named here as M. tricystidiatus.
